title: Heysen on Heysen
creator_credit: John Dick, Lesley Hammond, Milton Ingerson Film and Television Productions and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: A filmic retrospective of a selection of paintings of Sir Hans Heysen, many from private collections, that reveal Heysen the man. Very lyrical, both visually and vocally.
creator_credit_for_label: John Dick, Lesley Hammond, Milton Ingerson Film and Television Productions and South Australian Film Corporation
